text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling fast
Night sky turns to gray
Feel the rhythm last
Dance the storm away

[Verse 2]
Puddles at our feet
Lightning lights the sky
Hear the thunder beat
Just you and I

[Chorus]
Oh we're dancing in the rain
Lose ourselves no pain
Just feel the joy sustain
Dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Splashing in the dark
Shadows start to play
Hearts ignite the spark
In a wild ballet

[Verse 4]
Music in the storm
Waves of sound embrace
Here we feel so warm
In this sacred space

[Chorus]
Oh we're dancing in the rain
Lose ourselves no pain
Just feel the joy sustain
Dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
